title: another patch no exhaust, ghost, redemption, kat, lb, jayce, rengar, hecarim, coc, khazix nerfs
body:
cmon riot you had like what a fucking month?
ban your silver employees and actually start listening to the fucking players that matter (the top 0.5%)

replies.body:
> ban your silver employees and actually start listening to the fucking players that matter

#YOU ARE SILVER

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=trEJ1B4J,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-11T01:19:42.745+0000)
>
> #YOU ARE SILVER

**NO IM NOT THIS IS NOT MY MAIN XD**
Top .5%... OP is silver... hate to break it to you but silver aint the top .5%

> [{quoted}](name=Best Kog NA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=trEJ1B4J,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-11T01:27:12.570+0000)
>
> Top .5%... OP is silver... hate to break it to you but silver aint the top .5%

Jesus and he is stuck in a rut with like 48% winrate. He is challenjour for sure

None of these needs nerfs except possibly hecarim.
Most of those champions are under 50% winrate, not commonly picked, and needs buffs/tweaks, if anything.

Considering you are silver 3, i am not sure that your opinions reflect the "top 0.5%".

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=trEJ1B4J,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-11T01:20:33.108+0000)
>
> None of these needs nerfs except possibly hecarim.
> Most of those champions are under 50% winrate, not commonly picked, and needs buffs/tweaks, if anything.
> 
> Considering you are silver 3, i am not sure that your opinions reflect the "top 0.5%".

god you're delusional
Why would Exhaust and Ghost get nerfs........ both are only played on a select set of champions/roles.
they literally just nerfed CoC's base damage to nothing
